lead_paragraph: The Shanghai Composite index plunged more than 6 percent, and investors kept an eye on the Greek debt crisis.

headline.print_headline: Shares Edge Down After Sell-Off in China
headline.main: Modest Loss for the Market After a Sell-Off in China

snippet: The Shanghai Composite index plunged more than 6 percent, and investors kept an eye on the Greek debt crisis.
abstract: Stocks fall slightly amid generally quiet market activity, as investors respond to sell-off of Chinese stocks and ongoing worries about debt negotiations in Greece.
